name: Armor Slot Configuration
description: Defines the 6 equipment slots for armor pieces in PrimalMyst

armor_slots.description: Head protection - helmets, crowns, circlets, and headgear

pure_types.armor: Heavy helmets, metal crowns, plate helms
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical circlets, divine crowns, enchanted headpieces
pure_types.evasion: Light hoods, agility masks, movement-enhancing headgear

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Reinforced magical crowns, blessed plate helms
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible metal helms, reinforced leather hoods
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Enchanted light circlets, mystical agility masks

armor_slots.description: Torso protection - chest plates, robes, shirts, and jackets

pure_types.armor: Heavy chest plates, metal vests, full plate armor
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical robes, divine vestments, arcane jackets
pure_types.evasion: Light shirts, agility vests, movement-focused clothing

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Enchanted plate mail, blessed heavy robes
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible chain mail, reinforced leather armor
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Mystical light robes, enchanted agility wear

armor_slots.description: Hand protection - gloves, gauntlets, bracers, and hand wraps

pure_types.armor: Heavy gauntlets, metal bracers, plate gloves
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical gloves, divine hand wraps, enchanted bracers
pure_types.evasion: Light gloves, agility wraps, dexterous hand gear

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Reinforced magical gauntlets, blessed heavy gloves
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible metal gloves, reinforced leather bracers
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Enchanted light gloves, mystical agility wraps

armor_slots.description: Waist equipment - belts, sashes, chains, and utility belts

pure_types.armor: Heavy utility belts, metal chains, reinforced leather belts
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical sashes, divine cord belts, enchanted chains
pure_types.evasion: Light utility belts, agility sashes, movement-enhancing belts

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Enchanted heavy belts, blessed utility chains
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible reinforced belts, adaptive utility gear
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Mystical light sashes, enchanted agility belts

armor_slots.description: Leg protection - pants, leggings, leg armor, and leg wraps

pure_types.armor: Heavy leg armor, metal leggings, plate leg guards
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical pants, divine leg wraps, enchanted leggings
pure_types.evasion: Light pants, agility leggings, movement-focused leg wear

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Reinforced magical leggings, blessed heavy pants
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible chain leggings, reinforced leather pants
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Mystical light pants, enchanted agility wear

armor_slots.description: Foot protection - boots, shoes, sandals, and foot wraps

pure_types.armor: Heavy boots, metal sabatons, reinforced shoes
pure_types.energy_shield: Magical shoes, divine sandals, enchanted foot wraps
pure_types.evasion: Light boots, agility shoes, movement-enhancing footwear

hybrid_types.armor_energy_shield: Enchanted heavy boots, blessed reinforced shoes
hybrid_types.armor_evasion: Flexible metal boots, reinforced agility shoes
hybrid_types.energy_shield_evasion: Mystical light sandals, enchanted swift boots

armor.mechanics: Direct damage mitigation, high physical defense

evasion.description: Avoiding damage through movement and positioning
evasion.mechanics: Dodge chance, movement speed, agility-based defense

armor_energy_shield.description: Combines physical protection with magical barriers

armor_evasion.mechanics: Moderate physical defense with mobility bonuses

energy_shield_evasion.mechanics: Magical barriers with enhanced dodge capabilities

design_principles.any_slot_any_type: Every armor slot can be pure (AR/ES/EV) or hybrid
design_principles.sovereign_alignment: All armor types align with Sovereign gods (positions 2, 4, 6)
design_principles.build_flexibility: Players can mix pure and hybrid pieces for customized defense
design_principles.mechanical_balance: Hybrids offer versatility, pures offer specialization

metadata.author: PrimalMyst Development Team
metadata.notes: Complete armor slot configuration with hexagonal integration and all slot indexes
metadata.implementation_status: Complete - All 6 slots with 6 armor types each implemented
